iDecide

Machine learning based customers profiling system

Project goals

Build machine learning based customers profiling system to provide the following functionality:

  • Ability to build customer profile, discovering customer's interests and preferences
  • Context based proposal of services to the customer
  • Increase customers satisfaction by providing most relevant information and proposals.

Implementation

Technologies and tools:

  • Classification (Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, Artificial Neural Net, Support Vector Machines, Nearest Neighbors, Naïve Bayes, Ensemble methods).
  • Regression(Ridge/Lasso/ElasticNet Regression, Decision Tree, Kernel Regression, Nearest Neighbors, Stochastic Gradient Descent, Ensemble methods).
  • Clusterization (Hierarchical Clustering, k-Means).
  • Dimensionality reduction (PCA, Hashing Trick, Feature Selection – Filtering/Wrapping).
  • Text analytics (tokenization, morphological analysis, vectorization, string metrics).
  • Recommendational systems (content-based, collaborative).
  • Languages: Python, R, MATLAB, SQL, PySpark.
  • Data science tools: pandas, numpy, scipy, sqlalchemy, SQL, MS Excel, Jupyter notebooks.
  • Text analysis tools: nltk, gensim, pymystem3, pymorphy2.
  • Machine learning tools: sklearn, R.
  • Cloud tools: Azure ML, Azure Functions, Azure SQL DB
  • Big data tools: Apache Spark.
  • Visualization: Matplotlib. Matplotlib.

Outcome

We have implemented the model, which generates relevant recomendation of services to the customers. During implementation phase the team completed the following steps:

  • Data preparartion.
  • Data analysis.
  • Criteria definition.
  • Models building.
  • Models testing..

Currently we are working on implementation of production-ready solution based on the model developed. This solution uses live production environment data and is capable to process needed amount of requests workload and needed amount of raw data. We are using Microsoft Azure cloud platform to achieve required performance and scalability.
